replies.body:
{{champion:86}} So let me get this straight, your Q heals you now?

{{champion:122}} If I hit a champion yes. 

{{champion:86}} And you get massive AD and you can apply all 5 bleed stacks at once!? 

{{champion:122}} Yep. All thanks to learning how to control my rage for Noxus. 

{{champion:86}} That is awesome. 

{{champion:122}} Well look at you. % True Health damage now. Who do you think you are? Vayne? 

{{champion:72}} That's a scary thought. 

{{champion:86}} Hey Skarner. Looking good. 

{{champion:122}} What are you carrying? 

{{champion:72}} Some crystals I will put on the map to give me power while I am near them. 

{{champion:122}} What kind of powers? 

{{champion:72}} Attack Speed, Movement Speed, and mana regen. 

{{champion:122}} Damn that sounds strong. 

_ding_

{{champion:86}} Time to get our roles. I call top. 

{{champion:72}} Jungle. 

{{champion:122}} Crap...I guess...mid?

{{champion:82}} And I will take ADC. 

{{champion:86}} {{champion:122}} {{champion:72}} Mordekaiser!!? 

{{champion:82}} Oh hey guys. I see you got reworks too. 

{{champion:86}} "Too?" You mean you got a rework into an ADC?

{{champion:82}} Kind of. You will see. 

_20 minutes later._

{{champion:114}} He's unstoppable!

{{champion:64}} What can we do!?

{{champion:55}} He going to kill us all!!

{{champion:222}} This is to crazy even for me!!

{{champion:432}} .....!!!

{{champion:82}} HAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAAHA. Yes...YES. Destroy them my dragon. Show them your fury!!!!

{{champion:86}} {{champion:122}} {{champion:72}} O_o



_The End_


Next time: The beginning of a new....PROJECT.

> Next time: The beginning of a new....PROJECT.

Wait! Don't tell me.  It is about Soraka, and her PROJECT to build a castle of Bananas for a very hungry Wukong?

Battle of the century
IT'S LE EPIC MEMER HIMSELF, THE LAUGHING FISH!

lol
I'm **STILL** waiting for my story about the black rose {{champion:7}} {{champion:8}} {{champion:50}} {{champion:60}}

{{champion:61}} Quiet I'm sneaking the ball in their base

Because she can

Lee Sin's Actual Response

{{champion:64}} Why are you guys screaming. Is something chasing you? I'M BLIND!
Nice!

(Ummm my first time making a story so....)

**One day, in this dangerous academy, there lies four ferocious and smart students.
They are:**
{{champion:103}} {{champion:8}} {{champion:245}} and{{champion:122}} 
Their adventures awaits.

**it was their first day in this academy**
{{champion:245}} Well, let's go in guys.
{{champion:103}} Do they treat foxes nice?
{{champion:122}} For Noxus, I will destroy this academy.
{{champion:8}} ..... You mean pass it?
**They all go in**
{{champion:36}} Why hello there. You must be my students. I am Mr. Mundoverse, you can also call me Mr. Mundo.
{{champion:245}} So what's our first class Mr. Mundo?
{{champion:36}} That shall be.... science
{{champion:8}} Oh la la
{{champion:36}} So let's begin. Oh wait I must tell you guys something. You break a school rule you get a strike. Three strikes and your suspended.
{{champion:103}} {{champion:245}} {{champion:122}} {{champion:8}} **gasps**
{{champion:36}} So, any of you like science here?
{{champion:245}} ME!!!
{{champion:36}} Show me what you have.
{{champion:245}} _takes out all his gear_
{{champion:36}} Welp strike one Ekko. I can tell this gear is dangerous, in fact, very dangerous...
{{champion:245}} **WHAT?!** But I live off with my inventions...
{{champion:36}} Well that's it for today. Your homework is to write me an essay what you love about science. See you tomorrow.

I have no idea why this got downvoted but I upvoted it to keep the number above 0. This story definitely has potential to be a great one so I hope you end up continuing it on other sales because this isn't just lightdragoon88's turf... right?
Thank you so much!
The sale people have been waiting for. {{champion:268}} alone should have tons of people "going in" on it, while {{champion:85}} is just generally fun to play especially on support.
